name: Nixxsz Maids Blazing
description:
The Coven of maid is an ancient order of maids that sworn to keep the Nixxsz Castle clean. In the year 666 after Nixxsz portals where open inside the castle and the maid where called once more!

Features:
- Multiple maids with diferent skills.
- Four enemy types, endlessly spawning in the the arena
- Skill-rewarding movement mechanics with dashes, jumps, and a grappling hook
- Special attacks
- Instant respawn button and fast respawn after death
